e: ￹`O~ `ka~`sini'ada~`an~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `cingra~.￺He is a person who needs to have kindness shown towards him.￻他是值得同情的人
￹`O~ `ka~`kasini'adaan~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `koya~ `ma~`rofo~`ay~.￺That prisoner is someone to feel sorry for.￻那些被關起來的人，值得同情
￹`O~ `ka~`lasini'adaay~ `a~ `Kawas~ `ko~ `Kawas~ `ita~.￺Our God is always gracious and kind.￻我們的上帝是滿有慈愛的神
￹`O~ `nano~ `sini'ada~ `no~ `Kawas~ `ko~ `saka~`pipa'orip~ `nira~ `i~ `titaanan~.￺God saves us on the basis of His grace.￻由於上帝的慈愛自罪惡中拯救我們，才使我們得著生命
